title: Daniel Cordier, from French Resistance hero to art dealer
title_page: Daniel Cordier, from French Resistance hero to art dealer - BBC News
maintext: "As my mother collapsed into my stepfather's arms, I raced upstairs and flung myself on my bed, and I sobbed. But then (¡­) I suddenly drew myself up, and I said to myself, 'But no, this is ridiculous," Cordier recalled in a 2018 interview with the BBC. "[P¨¦tain] is just a stupid old fool! We have to do something."
